system.requirement: Once you fill 5 boxes on your quests legacy trackâ€¦

abilities.description: Envision the title, sigil, uniform, or tattoo you bear in recognition of your achievements. When you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.9f538fabf8998c5b]{Compel} or @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.05909d6310d209a6]{Make a Connection} among those who would know your reputation, add +1. On a strong hit with a match, your notoriety grows; mark 2 ticks on your bonds legacy track.

When you risk your reputation to overcome a miss, reroll any dice. If you score a miss again, fill one segment of a six-segment clock to represent the stain on your reputation. When the clock is filled, discard this asset.
Once per fight, when you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.3f5a834fa3fea5d1]{Gain Ground} through intimidation or command, reroll any dice and mark progress on a hit.
